typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	alds_folder as string,
	staging_directory as string,
	destination_folder as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> source1
source1 derive(timestamp = currentTimestamp()) ~> AddTimeStamp
AddTimeStamp sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: ($alds_folder),
	folderPath: (concatWS('/',$staging_directory, $destination_folder)),
	mergeSchema: false,
	autoCompact: false,
	optimizedWrite: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
